IdentifiableJsonMySqlPersistence<T extends org.pipservices4.data.data.IIdentifiable<K>,K>
Abstract persistence component that stores data in MySQL in JSON or JSONB fields and implements a number of CRUD operations over data items with unique ids.

Helper class that resolves MySQL connection and credential parameters, validates them and generates a connection URI.
